rows.label: qev075101_MSG0001
rows.name: Come! Let us do this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0010
rows.name: Ask His Name

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0011
rows.name: Inquire about the Wrothian's name.

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0020
rows.name: Ask His Plan

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0021
rows.name: Find out what the Wrothian wants to do.

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0030
rows.name: Refuse Outright

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0031
rows.name: Turn him down, just to be safe.

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0002
rows.name: I am Gi Zang, survivor of the Hundred Hellions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I am on a journey to hone my fighting skills by facing
powerful warriors such as yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Two warriors meet and you have to ask what they do?
Ha! Choose your weapon, [ST:gender p1=sir p2=madam ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0005
rows.name: Whaaat? Why not? Come on, please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Um, I mean... Very well! Come find me if you change
your mind, bold warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0007
rows.name:
But first, I must ask you to hunt a vice simius or
10 faded adseculas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0008
rows.name:
One must always warm up before a battle, eh?
So what say you? Are you prepared?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Yes, yes, YES! I cannot wait to prove how the strength
and pride of the Hundred Hellions lives on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0040
rows.name: Calm

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0041
rows.name: Encourage Gi Zang to take a deep breath.

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0050
rows.name: Rouse

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0051
rows.name: Match your enthusiasm to Gi Zang's.

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! You do a fine job of hiding it,
but I smell the bloodlust burning within you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0011
rows.name: We are the same then, you and I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Now begin the hunt, for neither of us shall make
progress by standing about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0013
rows.name: Well, friend? Have you defeated the mark I set?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ah, you chose the vice simius for your prey?
A bold choice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0015
rows.name:
So you defeated the 10 faded adseculas? They are
quick as lightning. A true challenge for a warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0017
rows.name:
It seems I have found myself the best training partner a
warrior could hope for![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0018
rows.name: Now then...let us begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0019
rows.name:
...What's that? You wish to know who lies passed-out
before you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0020
rows.name:
He is a quick-mouthed braggart who challenged me to
a duel. I made sure to silence his yawp quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0021
rows.name:
He was disappointingly frail for such a large foe.
One punch, and he struck dirt like a sack of old hams.
I believe he said his name was...Tolba Wolfen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0060
rows.name: Beware

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0061
rows.name:
Raise your guard as you realize the
full potential of Gi Zang's strength.

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0070
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Tolba if he's all right.

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Ah! I sense a change in both temperament and form!
Is this your ready-for-anything stance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0023
rows.name:
You're sharp, warrior. I'd best stay on guard myself,
or this could be over before I know it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Worry notâ€”I avoided striking any vital organs.
He should come around soon enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Mostly I'm impressed that you're worrying about him
just before fighting the one who put him down.
Are you truly so sure of yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0026
rows.name:
I shall be eager to see whether that confidence comes
from a lifetime of training or just empty optimism.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0027
rows.name:
We've had our warm-ups. From this point forth,
I hold nothing back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0028
rows.name:
I am Gi Zang, last survivor of the Hundred Hellions
and inheritor of my master's sword. I draw it now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Unstoppable and unassailable, our strength was the
unsung pillar that kept the Wrothians standing.
Now prepare to see it for yourself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0030
rows.name:
You are strong, warrior. And while I may have lost,
it was the most fun I've had in an age![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0080
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang that you enjoyed it as well.

rows.label: qev075101_JNK0090
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev075101_SEL0091
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang that you're far from satisfied.

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0031
rows.name:
My master always used to say a true warrior finds joy
in the direst of situations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Watching you, I feel as if I finally understand what he
meant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! You truly hunger for battle, my friend!
I do not think there are many who could rival that,
even amongst the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0034
rows.name: You are in all ways a warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Here's a little thank-you for fighting me. Go on, take it.
I won't take no for an answer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0036
rows.name:
I swore to grow stronger, to both my master and
to Prince Jiarg when he granted me leave to take
this journey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075101_MSG0037
rows.name: The next time we fight, I will not lose![ST:wait ]
